channel.description: Recent content in オフィシャルアナウンス on DeFiGeek Community

item.title: Development Updates September 2022
item.description: Introduction DFGC has been developing several DeFi & NFT projects. They are ongoing in an undisclosed manner in order to protect our ideas & codes from being stolen. The purpose of publishing this report is to secure transparency of our development activity to some extent & increase public awareness of our activity to attract people to join & be contributors to our community. Progress Report YAMATO Core Development The first audit report has been finalized.
